text.section: In Kent and Wicomico counties, it is unlawful for any person not designated under § 1-102(a)(6) of this article to loaf, loiter, or to be a nuisance on any premises for which a Class B or Class D beer license has been issued, and for any licensee, agent, servant, or employee to permit any person not designated under § 1-102(a)(6) of this article to loaf or loiter on the premises.
Any person who violates this section shall be punished by a fine not to exceed two hundred dollars ($200.00) or by imprisonment not to exceed one year, or both.
